title: Workshop on Instructional Design for Secondary STEM Education Utilizing UAS (Unmanned Aircraft Systems)

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: A systematic course for pre-service teachers and educational technology majors to acquire UAS (drone)-based STEM teaching methods.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain UAS safety operation guidelines and FAA regulations (virtual application) with 80% or higher accuracy.
Learners can design three or more STEM education scenarios using a UAS simulator in a collaborative learning environment.
Learners optimize UAS-STEM lesson plans developed through blended training via peer evaluation and competition.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
